ingredients: 1 cup quick cooking oats,   +   3/4 cup flaked coconut, 1 cup all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 1 cup white sugar,   +   1/2 cup butter, 1 tablespoon golden syrup, 2 tablespoons boiling water
nutrition: Total Fat 10g 12%, Saturated Fat 6g 31%, Cholesterol 20mg 7%, Sodium 174mg 8%, Total Carbohydrate 33g 12%, Dietary Fiber 1g 5%, Total Sugars 19g, Protein 2g, Calcium 8mg 1%, Iron 1mg 4%, Potassium 55mg 1%
